sections.heading: What is 間 (aida)?
sections.content:
間 (あいだ - aida) means "interval," "period," or "duration." It's used to express how long something lasts or the time span between events.

3時間 "3 hours" (duration) 日本にいる間 "while/during being in Japan" 夏休みの間 "during summer vacation"

children.heading: Time Period + 間
children.content:
To emphasize duration, add 間 after time expressions:

1時間 → 1時間(の間) "for 1 hour" 3日間 "for 3 days" 2週間 "for 2 weeks" 1年間 "for 1 year"

children.heading: With or Without 間
children.content:
Some time words can be used with or without 間:

3時間 = 3時間 "3 hours" (both acceptable) But: 3日 vs 3日間 "3 days" - 間 emphasizes the duration

children.heading: Hours
children.content: 1時間 - 1 hour 2時間 - 2 hours 半時間 - half an hour 何時間 - how many hours 2時間勉強した "I studied for 2 hours"

children.heading: Days
children.content: 1日 - 1 day 2日間 - 2 days 3日間 - 3 days 何日間 - how many days 3日間東京にいました "I was in Tokyo for 3 days"

children.heading: Weeks
children.content: 1週間 - 1 week 2週間 - 2 weeks 3週間 - 3 weeks 何週間 - how many weeks 2週間休みます "I'll rest for 2 weeks"

children.heading: Months
children.content: 1ヶ月 / 一ヶ月 - 1 month 2ヶ月 - 2 months 半年 - half a year 何ヶ月 - how many months 3ヶ月日本語を勉強した "I studied Japanese for 3 months"

children.heading: Years
children.content: 1年 / 1年間 - 1 year 2年間 - 2 years 3年間 - 3 years 何年間 - how many years 5年間働きました "I worked for 5 years"

children.heading: [Time/Event] + の間
children.content:
Expresses "during" or "while":

夏休みの間 "during summer vacation" 会議の間 "during the meeting" 授業の間 "during class" 旅行の間 "during the trip"

children.heading: With Verbs: ている間
children.content: 寝ている間 "while sleeping" 勉強している間 "while studying" 日本にいる間 "while in Japan" 待っている間 "while waiting"

children.heading: どのくらい/どれくらい
children.content:
"How long":

どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long will it take?" どれくらい日本にいますか？ "How long will you be in Japan?" どのくらい勉強しましたか？ "How long did you study?"

children.heading: 何時間/何日間
children.content:
Specific time units:

何時間かかりますか？ "How many hours will it take?" 何日間休みますか？ "How many days will you rest?" 何年間働きましたか？ "How many years did you work?"

children.heading: を with Duration (Optional)
children.content:
Duration can take を but often omitted:

3時間(を)勉強した "I studied for 3 hours" 2日間(を)休んだ "I rested for 2 days"

children.heading: に with Points in Time
children.content:
Note the difference:

3時に - at 3 o'clock (point) 3時間 - for 3 hours (duration) 月曜日に - on Monday (point) 3日間 - for 3 days (duration)

children.heading: 〜間に (during/within)
children.content:
Something happens within a period:

夏休みの間に旅行した "I traveled during summer vacation" 1時間の間に終わった "It finished within 1 hour" 授業の間に寝てしまった "I fell asleep during class"

children.heading: 〜間ずっと (the whole time)
children.content:
Throughout the entire duration:

1時間ずっと待った "I waited the whole hour" 夏休みの間ずっと勉強した "I studied throughout summer vacation" 3日間ずっと雨だった "It rained for the whole 3 days"

children.heading: Continuous Actions
children.content: 3時間勉強した "I studied for 3 hours" 2時間映画を見た "I watched a movie for 2 hours" 30分走った "I ran for 30 minutes"

children.heading: States
children.content: 3日間病気だった "I was sick for 3 days" 1年間日本にいる "I'll be in Japan for 1 year" 2週間忙しい "I'll be busy for 2 weeks"

children.heading: Example 1: Study Duration
children.content: A: 毎日どのくらい勉強しますか？ "How long do you study every day?" B: 2時間ぐらい勉強します "I study for about 2 hours" A: 週末は？ "What about weekends?" B: 3時間ぐらい勉強します "I study for about 3 hours"

children.heading: Example 2: Vacation
children.content: A: 夏休みはどのくらいですか？ "How long is summer vacation?" B: 2ヶ月間です "It's 2 months" A: その間に何をしますか？ "What will you do during that time?" B: 旅行するつもりです "I plan to travel"

children.heading: Example 3: Work Experience
children.content: A: どのくらい働いていますか？ "How long have you been working?" B: 5年間働いています "I've been working for 5 years" A: 同じ会社ですか？ "The same company?" B: はい、同じ会社です "Yes, the same company"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using に with duration
children.content: Wrong: 3時間に勉強した ❌ Right: 3時間勉強した ✓ "I studied for 3 hours"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing 間 and 時
children.content: 3時間 - 3 hours (duration) 3時 - 3 o'clock (time point) Wrong context: 3時勉強した (studied at 3 o'clock - incomplete) Right: 3時間勉強した (studied for 3 hours)

children.heading: Mistake 3: Wrong counter
children.content: Wrong: 3時間日 ❌ Right: 3日間 ✓ "3 days"

children.heading: ぐらい/くらい (about)
children.content: 2時間ぐらい "about 2 hours" 3日間くらい "about 3 days" 1週間ぐらい "about 1 week"

children.heading: 〜ほど (approximately)
children.content: 1時間ほど "about 1 hour" 2ヶ月ほど "about 2 months"

children.heading: まで (until)
children.content: 3時まで勉強した "I studied until 3 o'clock" 金曜日まで待つ "I'll wait until Friday"

children.heading: から〜まで (from~until)
children.content: 9時から5時まで働く "I work from 9 to 5" 月曜日から金曜日まで学校がある "I have school from Monday to Friday"

children.heading: この間 (the other day/recently)
children.content: この間会った "I met (them) the other day" この間映画を見た "I watched a movie recently"

children.heading: その間 (during that time/meanwhile)
children.content: その間に準備する "I'll prepare during that time" その間待っていてください "Please wait during that time"

children.heading: しばらくの間 (for a while)
children.content: しばらくの間休みます "I'll rest for a while" しばらくの間会っていない "I haven't met (them) for a while"

children.heading: 少なくとも (at least)
children.content: 少なくとも1時間かかる "It takes at least 1 hour" 少なくとも3日間必要だ "At least 3 days are needed"

children.heading: 最大 (maximum)
children.content: 最大2時間 "maximum 2 hours" 最大1週間かかる "It takes a maximum of 1 week"

children.heading: Basic Duration
children.content: 3時間勉強した "I studied for 3 hours" 2日間休みました "I rested for 2 days" 1週間旅行する "I'll travel for 1 week" 5年間日本にいます "I'll be in Japan for 5 years"

children.heading: During/While
children.content: 夏休みの間に旅行した "I traveled during summer vacation" 授業の間に寝た "I slept during class" 日本にいる間、勉強します "While in Japan, I'll study" 待っている間、本を読んだ "While waiting, I read a book"

children.heading: Questions
children.content: どのくらいかかりますか？ "How long will it take?" 何時間勉強しますか？ "How many hours will you study?" どれくらい日本にいますか？ "How long will you be in Japan?"

children.heading: Approximate
children.content: 2時間ぐらいかかります "It takes about 2 hours" 3日間くらい休みます "I'll rest for about 3 days" 1週間ほど待ってください "Please wait about 1 week"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: Time Words - Specific time expressions Frequency - How often Before/After - Temporal relationships 〜ている間 - While doing 〜ながら - While/simultaneous Counters - Time counters
